role_description: An Ansible role that installs SwitchHosts on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [SwitchHosts](https://github.com/oldj/SwitchHosts) is an application for managing the etc hosts file. It allows you to easily switch between different etc hosts file configurations.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs SwitchHosts on nearly any platform.
